response.name: changePassword-notmatch

request.description:
Delete Account endpoint. See examples for more further information.
Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.

Add biodata endpoint. See examples for more further information. Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.
body.date is a default date() format YYYY-MM-DD.
body.gender is a enum male/female.

Edit biodata endpoint. See examples for more further information. Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.
body.date is a default date() format YYYY-MM-DD.
body.gender is a enum male/female.
Get biodata endpoint. See examples for more further information. Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.

Add history endpoint. See examples for more further information. Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.
body.action is a enum point/stage

Get user, biodata, history detail endpoint. 
See examples for more further information. Require login as token, Header Authorization:token.
Get all user detail endpoint. It will needed Authorization:token admin.
